vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting the renewal of Specific Use Permit No. 2087 for a recycling buy-back center for the collection of household metals and recyclable materials on property zoned an IM Industrial Manufacturing District, generally on the northwest side of Hickory Street, northeast of South Malcolm X Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a revised site plan and revised conditions
Z190-284(PD)
